Text:
Awesome quality!
If folks want the complete Samurai Jack series they should be choosing this one; it's of great quality video and audio with three sets of audio languages and three sets of subtitle languages which all can be changed on-the-fly.
Thank you sir.

''Video: H.264/x264, 720x480 (same as DVD) ''

720x480 my ass
is just 640x480 with tri audio eng_fr_sp + trisubs
